HTML5 canvas fancy Mandelbrot Set

Added a few buttons and fields to the Mandelbrot Set generator. I'll add some decent zooming / panning functionality one day. Warning: it may take a few seconds.

HTML5 canvas Mandelbrot Set

After playing around with the HTML5 canvas element I had a quick go at rendering a Mandelbrot Set. Why? because they look fucking awesome. Warning: it may take a few seconds. Great success.
